16 constexpr double T2H2Ratio = 6.032099 / 2.015650;
17 
18 namespace Kassiopeia
19 {
20 
24 
25 void KSIntCalculatorTritiumElastic::CalculateCrossSection( const double anEnergie,
26  double& aCrossSection
27  )
28 {
29 // See: Liu, Phys. Rev. A35 (1987) 591,
30 // Trajmar, Phys Reports 97 (1983) 221.
31 
32  const double e[ 14 ] =
33  { 0., 1.5, 5., 7., 10., 15., 20., 30., 60., 100., 150., 200., 300., 400. };
34  const double s[ 14 ] =
35  { 9.6, 13., 15., 12., 10., 7., 5.6, 3.3, 1.1, 0.9, 0.5, 0.36, 0.23, 0.15 };
36 
37  const double emass = 1. / (KConst::Alpha() * KConst::Alpha());
38  const double a02 = KConst::BohrRadiusSquared();
39 
40  double gam, T;
41  T = anEnergie / ( 2 * KConst::ERyd_eV() );
42  if( anEnergie >= 400. )
43  {
44  gam = (emass + T) / emass;
45  aCrossSection = gam * gam * KConst::Pi() / (2. * T) * (4.2106 - 1. / T) * a02;
46  }
47  else
48  {
49  for( unsigned int i = 0; i <= 12; i++ )
50  {
51  if( anEnergie >= e[ i ] && anEnergie < e[ i + 1 ] )
52  aCrossSection = 1.e-20 *
53  ( s[ i ] + (s[ i + 1 ] - s[ i ])
54  * (anEnergie - e[ i ])
55  / (e[ i + 1 ] - e[ i ])
56  );
57  }
58  }
59 
60  return;
61 }
62 
63 void KSIntCalculatorTritiumElastic::CalculateEloss( const double anEnergie,
64  const double aTheta,
65  double& anEloss
66  )
67 {
68  double H2molmass = 69.e6;
69  double emass = 1. / (KConst::Alpha() * KConst::Alpha());
70  double cosTheta = cos( aTheta );
71 
72  anEloss = 2. * emass / (T2H2Ratio * H2molmass) * (1. - cosTheta) * anEnergie;
73 
74  //check if electron won energy by elastic scattering on a molecule;
75  //this keeps electron energies around the gas temperature
76 
77 // if( anEnergie < 1. )
78 // {
79 // double rndNr = sqrt (-2.* log(KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform()));
80 // double rndAngle = 2. * KConst::Pi() * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform();
81 //
82 // //generation of molecule velocity by maxwell-boltzmann distribution
83 // double Gx = rndNr * cos( rndAngle );
84 // double Gy = rndNr * sin( rndAngle );
85 // double Gz = sqrt( -2. * log( KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() ) )
86 // * cos( 2. * KConst::Pi() * KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() );
87 //
88 // //thermal velocity of gas molecules
89 // double T = 300.; //gas temperature
90 // double sigmaT = sqrt( KConst::kB() * T / (2. * KConst::M_prot_kg()) );
91 // KThreeVector MolVelocity( sigmaT * Gx, sigmaT * Gy, sigmaT * Gz );
92 //
93 // //new electron velocity vector and energy:
94 //
95 // //assume electron velocity along z
96 // KThreeVector ElVelocity( 0., 0., sqrt( 2. * anEnergie * KConst::Q() / KConst::M_el_kg() ) );
97 // //relative velocity electron-molecule
98 // KThreeVector RelativeVelocity = ElVelocity - MolVelocity;

120 // }
121  return;
